context: Will this adapter provide the audio from Netflix or the TV app too? Or Just game audio
response: Yes I watch Netflix and Hulu and the sound transmits though the headset. I have my adapter working with a Turtle Beach PX4 headset and the Xbox One.

context: Is a Xbox LIVE subscription required to download game with purchase of this card?
response: Yes. It does not require gold, but you do need to be a member of Xbox live to redeem the code. If you do not want to pay for gold you can simply make a free silver account.

context: Will this work on iMac Maverick OS?
response: Works great for me and I have the most recent update for mac
yes it does work on windows 8
I haven't tried it, but I don't think so. PlayStations have built-in drivers, I believe. It works with Macs and PCs, though.

context: Is it easy to configure for X-Plane 10
response: Sorry I don't know. I have it configured for Raise of Flight

context: Why does this one cost so much money? 2nd is only $25.
response: This is one of the only things that's not a firearm in my fireproof safe...

context: How difficult would it be to replace the USB cable if it broke?
response: I am not experienced with doing so because it comes with it. So I would have to strip the wire and add a new one. Which wouldn't look as nice. In all, pretty hard to replace.

context: is this a first person game?
response: My son said it's Nothing like the show ...people are different ....doesn't play it the cusing is plentiful he's looking to trade the game ...none of his friends who are ALL DEAD fans want it ... two had it and traded it at game stop ...

context: Will wii 2.0 play on regular Wii, if buy Wiiu infinity? Need to know ASAP, sorry, bought wrong
response: No it does not play on the original Wii. To play Infinity 2.0 characters you need to change to a X Box 1 or a Playstation 4 or the Wii universe (or whatever the latest model is called).

context: Is the game's software eventually downloaded to my PC for off-line play, or must I always be on the web?
response: You must play on-line by UPLAY.

context: Does it fit with a turtle beach?
response: yes this will work with a Turtle Beach

response: im still using mines, I don't know how long it ill last, but mines runs fine for now

response: that's not a product question but a technical question related to your operating system and your software/hardware

response: PS4 version due out in mid Feb 2015 I believe...just announce a couple of weeks ago on IGN

context: will this work combined with CH rudder pedals?
response: Mine was dead on arrival. Support was awful. Expect that if they don't work off the bat, they likely won't work at all. The pedals are usually run through the simulator anyway , so if you are using plane, you are likely good to go.

context: Does this support co op? Playing two players against each other offline?
response: yes absolutely, 2 people can play offline as long as you got 2 controllers.
